article_title: In Illinois, Clinton and Sanders Vie for Obama Legacy
article_text:
Voters in President Barack Obama’s home state of Illinois will help decide Tuesday which of the two Democratic candidates should be the heir to his political legacy.

With polls showing the race tightening, both former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton and Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders have pitched themselves as best positioned to defend and expand on the president’s achievements. Mrs. Clinton points to her service in the Obama...
